channel.title: Hugo PacMan Theme Demo
channel.description: Recent content on Hugo PacMan Theme Demo

item.title: Athena and R ... there is another way!?
item.description: Intro Currently there are two key ways in connecting to Athena from R, using the ODBC and JDBC drivers. To access ODBC driver R users can use the excellent odbc package supported by Rstudio. To access the JDBC driver R users can either use RJDBC or helpful wrapper package AWR.Athena which wraps the RJDBC package to make the connection to Athena through the JDBC driver simpler. These methods are an excellent way for R to connect to Athena, however is there another way?
